item.title: Vim Sessions
item.description: Vim is an awesome editor. Vim provides a tool to save your time, helping you to get back to the previous mindset of the last time you left the project. Itâ€™s called sessions. A Session keeps the Views for all windows, plus the global settings. You can save a Session and when you restore it later the window layout looks the same. You can use a Session to quickly switch between different projects, automatically loading the files you were last working on in that project.
